products.title: Ribbons Solar Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Ribbons solar, a very affordable and quality blinds perfect for any home, there are many beautiful colours to choose from. Featuring an aluminium coated back, this fabric reflects heat in summer and retains heat in summer. A perfect thermal fabric.
